content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to information that hasn't been officially announced yet, and I cannot predict the future. However, I can tell you that the athletic wear industry is expected to grow in the coming years due to increased consumer interest in health and fitness. This growth is primarily attributed to the rise of athleisure wear and the growing popularity of sports activities. In order to stay competitive and relevant, companies like Reebok will need to continue to innovate and focus on sustainability, inclusivity, and personalization of their products.
